text: Hi <@U018SKF3M9U>! Is there any news regarding this? :slightly_smiling_face: I am about to create a lot of templates at work, and right now I am building them in sections right inside the editor, and then saving the email as template from there, which is very time consuming
Hi <@U01HXMTQ085> <@U01QW45AR0Q> would have more insight on the current status of this
